rules_text:
Opponents can't cast spells as long as Elias Keiler, Ace Reporter is attacking.
{R}, Discard a card: Elias Keiler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{W}, Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Elias Keiler this turn.
At the beginning of each end step, draw a card for each card you've discarded this turn.
